long_description: The men's Saucony Kinvara 4 road-running shoes offer a responsive, minimalist ride built for comfort while running on pavement. Breathable uppers keep your feet cool when your pace heats up. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a midfoot/forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Ultralight seamless uppers feature a minimal, highly breathable design with thin nylon mesh and bonded thermoplastic urethane overlays that supply structure and support. Nylon linings wick moisture away to keep your feet cool. Memory foam around the heels delivers comfort and maintains a snug fit. Cushioning system in heels works in tandem with lightweight EVA midsoles to maximize cushioning and enhance efficiency and response. Outsoles on the Saucony Kinvara 4 feature low-profile triangular lugs along with decoupled, beveled heels for excellent performance.
short_description: The men's Saucony Kinvara 4 road-running shoes offer a responsive, minimalist ride built for comfort while running on pavement. Breathable uppers keep your feet cool when your pace heats up.
